All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Aliens
Descrubes a charecter that is called alien that is the eneny of the game.
Bonus
Simple interface that will allow us later on to descirbe how bonus work at the end of levels.
Charecter
Defines a polygon and has mutlple methods such as paint and contains that all charecters in the game need and use.
Ship
Describes a charecter called ship that the player holds.
SpaceInvaders
Main class where all the calss for movement painting and creating objects are made for the game.
